Lyric:
[00:06.399]We clawed, we chained, our hearts in vain
[00:10.499]We jumped, never asking why
[00:14.399]We kissed, I fell under your spell
[00:18.410]A love no one could deny
[00:23.090]Don’t you ever say I just walked away
[00:27.510]I will always want you
[00:30.800]I can’t live a lie, running for my life
[00:35.519]I will always want you
[00:39.920]I came in like a wrecking ball
[00:43.210]I never hit so hard in love
[00:47.250]All I wanted was to break your walls
[00:51.049]All you ever did was break me
[00:55.960]Yeah, you wreck me
[01:00.390]I put you high up in the sky
[01:04.700]And now, you’re not coming down
[01:08.269]It slowly turned, you let me burn
[01:13.719]And now, we’re ashes on the ground
[01:17.840]Don’t you ever say I just walked away
[01:21.930]I will always want you
[01:25.460]I can’t live a lie, running for my life
[01:30.460]I will always want you
[01:33.900]I came in like a wrecking ball
[01:37.000]I never hit so hard in love
[01:41.000]All I wanted was to break your walls
[01:44.190]All you ever did was break me
[01:50.500]I came in like a wrecking ball
[01:52.410]Yeah, I just closed my eyes and swung
[01:57.300]Left me crouching in a blaze and fall
[02:00.700]All you ever did was break me
[02:05.589]Yeah, you wreck me
[02:11.480]I never meant to start a war
[02:16.110]I just wanted you to let me in
[02:19.599]And instead of using force
[02:22.660]I guess I should’ve let you in
[02:27.100]I never meant to start a war
[02:31.399]I just wanted you to let me in
[02:34.328]I guess I should’ve let you in
[02:43.190]Don’t you ever say I just walked away
[02:46.599]I will always want you
[02:50.929]I came in like a wrecking ball
[02:55.290]I never hit so hard in love
[02:59.890]All I wanted was to break your walls
[03:03.049]All you ever did was break me
